main event: An irregular shaped light object, similar to an automobile headlight, was observed at Glasgow AFB, Montana on May 20, 1964, by two separate groups of witnesses.
interesting points: The object was bright white in color and pulsing intermittently,The first group observed the object for about 40 minutes while the second group saw it for over two hours,The light varied in color from bright white to tarnish-orange,The object appeared to move from southwest to northeast across the sky,Comments from the base commander suggested it could be a natural phenomenon.
sighted object: irregular shaped object resembling an automobile headlight
witness description: two separate groups of USAF personnel, including a cook and a training office worker
